Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah... <MYNAME>, thanks for coming. I'm
happy to see you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, I've got something to research...
A reporter from another town asked
for my help... Gotta get to it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? What's wrong?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah... It's true that I've been running
around a lot lately and it's not good
for my health. But that's my job, so...
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, there are times when I can't
just rest, you know. I have to push
myself to some extent.

You might say that, but it looks like
it's pretty hard on you.
Persuade her to take a break
Lend a hand
Take her place and do it for her
Gather some provisions for her

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
L-Like I said... I have to push myself
somewhat. This is my job we're talking
about.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
So if I rest a little, it will improve
my efficiency later? Yeah, but if I rest
now I'll probably sleep till tomorrow.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, you'll stay by my side and wake me
up when I've got to get going? But...

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, if you feel that strongly about
it, I guess I'll take a little break.
Make sure to wake me, OK?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, my physical condition? Yeah, I'm
feeling my better. Feels like a weight
has been lifted off my shoulders.
<PAGE>
I feel like I'll be able to fly through
my work now.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you'll help me? Well, I guess that
sounds pretty good. Thanks!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
... And that does it. Job's all
finished. Thank you very much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, thank you. I bet I would have
collapsed if I tried to push through it.
I'm glad you stopped me.
<PAGE>
I'm so happy to have you as boyfriend.
I love you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... You'd actually do that? Thanks,
that would really help me out.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, if you look for the document
over on that bookshelf, I'll search
this one.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. We did it. Thank you so much,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
W-What's... Everything's spinning...

This is bad! Quick! You need to get her
to the hospital!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh boy. What were you thinking? I know
you wanted to respect her wishes, but
if she collapses, it's all for nothing.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Urgh.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like she's awake. Tina, how do you
feel?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm okay. I actually feel much better
now. Sorry for causing a big commotion.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you're all right then. I see.
<PAGE>
I'm relieved. In that case, I think
it's time to give you a piece of my
mind.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Both of you, sit up straight! I'm going
to give you a nice long lecture on
staying in good physical condition!

He was pretty angry... I better not
let Tina push herself too hard again, or
I'll have to face his wrath again...

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
No way. Even if you offer, I can't let
you do that. After all, it's my job.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
B-But...

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you're really set on it, I guess I'll
take you up on the offer.
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, sorry for making you worry.
I'm really feeling a lot better now!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you did the research for me! Thanks
so much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
And in return...<RED>∀</RED> <MYNAME>, I love you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? Are you sure? Thanks, <MYNAME>.  
That makes me happy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Well then, I'll take it from here. Feel
free to use the kitchen however you
like...

This is bad! Quick! You need to get her
to the hospital!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What in the world were you thinking?
Given the situation, you should have
done the research in her place.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Urgh.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like she's awake. Tina, how do you
feel?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm OK. I actually feel much better
now. Sorry for causing a big commotion.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that thing I had to research? Thanks
to you, I was able to get it done.
<PAGE>
Then I lost consciousness and I guess I
fell. Not so bad if I do say so myself.
Ha!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see. Well it seems both your work and
physical condition are fine then.
<PAGE>
I'm relieved. In that case, I think
it's time to give you a piece of my
mind.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Both of you, sit up straight! I'm going
to give you a nice long lecture on
staying in good physical condition!

He was pretty angry... I better not
let Tina push herself too hard again, or
I'll have to face his wrath again...
